response.overview: The 2025 League of Legends World Championship is an upcoming esports tournament for the multiplayer online battle arena video game League of Legends, set to be held in China from 14 October to 9 November â€” in Beijing, Shanghai, and Chengdu. It is the fifteenth iteration of the League of Legends World Championship, an annual international tournament organised by the game's developer, Riot Games.
response.title: 2025 League of Legends World Championship
